## QNameFactory.maybeCreateQNameFromString() method

Creates a QName from a string if possible.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
maybeCreateQNameFromString(qname: string): QName | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  qname | string | String to create a QName from |

<b>Returns:</b>

QName \| null

A QName if it can be created, or `null` if something goes wrong when creating a QName.
